titleStmt.title: At the Court at White-Hall, August the 14, 1663 present : the Kings Most excellent Majesty, Lord Chancellour, Lord Treasurer, Lord Privy-Seal ... [et al.]
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Concerns the case of William Christian of the Isle of Man, put to death by local magistrates in 1551, in spite of a general pardon from the King.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
